name: Sales Tax Reports
query:
SELECT 
	s.tin as "TIN:Data:120", 
	s.registered_name as "Registered Name:Data:200", 
	s.registered_address as "Registered Address:Data:400",
	a.atc as "ATC:Data:50", 
	ABS(a.tax_rate) as "Tax Rate:Percent:50",
	credit-debit as "Amount Withheld:Currency:200", 
	(credit-debit)/(ABS(a.tax_rate/100)) as "Tax Base:Currency:200",
	e.voucher_type as "Voucher Type:Data:100", 
	e.voucher_no as "Voucher No:Dynamic Link/Voucher Type:100"
FROM `tabGL Entry` e, `tabAccount` a, `tabSupplier` s
WHERE e.account = a.name
AND a.tax_type = 'EWT'
AND e.against = s.name
AND e.posting_date BETWEEN %(date_from)s AND %(date_to)s;
